attributes.action: stop convicted rapists and murderers being held in protective custody away from the General Population of prisons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If someone rapes and/or murders children, women or old age pensioners, they do not deserve to receive protection from other inmates - where was the protection for their victims?

Perhaps if they knew that upon conviction, they would be in the General Population of the prison in which they are kept - rather than in protective custody - perhaps that will act as a deterrant for some of them, stopping some people becoming victims.

Why should these criminals have protection which their victims were unable to have?
